Package com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal

Contains the option classes for PDFElectronicSealOperation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TSAOptions
    This interface represents the basic contract for the timestamp authority options to be used with SealOptions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppearanceOptions
    Parameters specifying set of elements (i.e.
    CertificateCredentials
    This marker class represents the basic contract for all the credential options to be used for applying PDF Electronic Seal by SealOptions.
    CSCAuthContext
    Parameters for representing CSC authorization context.
    CSCCredential
    Parameters for representing the CSC Provider based credentials as a subtype for CertificateCredentials.
    CSCCredential.Builder
    Builds a CSCCredential instance.
    FieldLocation
    Parameters specifying options related to seal field location coordinates required for FieldOptions.
    FieldOptions
    Parameters specifying options related to the seal field required for SealOptions.
    FieldOptions.Builder
    Builds a FieldOptions instance.
    RFC3161TSAOptions
    Parameters specifying RFC3161 compliant time stamp authority options required for SealOptions.
    SealOptions
    Parameters for specifying the input seal options required for PDFElectronicSealOperation.
    SealOptions.Builder
    Builds a SealOptions instance.
    TSABasicAuthCredentials
    Parameters specifying options related to the time stamp authority credentials required for RFC3161TSAOptions.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AppearanceItem
    Supported elements to represent electronic seal required for AppearanceOptions.
    DocumentLevelPermission
    Supported document level permissions that can be set in electronic seal request required for SealOptions.
    SignatureFormat
    Supported signature formats to create electronic seal required for SealOptions.

Package com.adobe.pdfservices.operation.pdfops.options.electronicseal Description

Contains the option classes for PDFElectronicSealOperation.
